column2: subject=''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', publication

column1: Tolkien told [[Rayner Unwin]] he would send Book III, the first part of [[The Two Towers
column2: Volume II]], carefully corrected. Book IV would follow later. Tolkien expressed some doubt in the title - ''The Two Towers'' - as the opposition between [[Orthanc]] and [[Tower of Cirith Ungol
